title: What do you like most about Sai Pallavi? - Quora

response.answer_text: She refused to work in a fairness cream advertisement though they have offered 2 crore rupees dealShe believes in natural beautyShe learns other language and she herself dubs for her filmsHer acting is naturalWonderful dancerShe did not want to get married because she wanted to be with her parents which might not possible after marriageThough some people said she does not look like an actress she proved them wrong by her acting.Her confidence to go with makeup while acting filmsdown-to-earth characterself-made starENOUGH REASONS TO LIKE HER She is one of the finest Actress in this era.

Sai Pallavi is one of the talented actresses in South Indian film industry. She has acted in many decent roles.  Sai Pallavi was acted as Tamil girl in Premam movie. Alphonse Putheran had crafted the character as Tamil girl as she belongs to Tamilnadu to show the differentiation in the characters. It may also the reason for Premam hit. During the film promotion and after the release, Sai Pallavi was started to referred to as Mallu girl by the media and she was not happy with this tag also.  She showed her displeasure in a Telugu entertainment magazine also. Sai Pallavi has revealed that she is a true Tamil girl hails from Coimbatore, Tamilnadu. She requested media to stop addressing her as Malli girl. This is the one I like her the most. We should always preserve our identity wherever we go.
